text: Bell Canyon is an unincorporated community in eastern Ventura County, California, United States. The 2020 United States census reported Bell Canyon's population was 1,946. According to a 2016 study, Bell Canyon is the seventh richest community in the state of California with an annual median income of $230,000. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Settlements in Ventura County, California
title: Bell Canyon, California
